title: Mosaic
creator_credit: Louise Jonas, Rob McCubbin and AVRB Film Unit
brief_description: Harold Freedman describes the different processes he undertook in constructing the mosaic at the State Offices, Geelong, Victoria, from the painting of the cartoon to final cleaning and grouting. The completed mosaic is shown in detail at the end of the film.
creator_credit_for_label: Louise Jonas, Rob McCubbin and AVRB Film Unit
